page.title: 16CLUBS.FOOTBALL/CRICKET.
page.content: The{Headcorn Football Club}playing field is situated in GRIGG LANE on private ground. There is an adult team also a well supported Junior team for Boys,playing most weekends during the Winter months.{Headcorn Cricket and {Tennis Club}has it's headquarters in the LENHAM ROAD. There is a good sized Cricket pitch; one grass,and two hard Tennis Courts on the same private land In 1985 a new Clubhouse was opened by Chris Tavare, the Kent and England Cricketer. It was built to replace the original one that was destroyed by fire the previous year. This pavilion, which has changing rooms, a licenced bar and Club facilites, was the result of much hard work by the Club members, and also houses a fine set of old photographs of Headcorn Cricket teams dating back to 1909.
